resources.string: The amount of fertilizer used in sample is less then the control. Hence, it is healthy to eat.
The amount of fertilizer used in sample is greater then the amount used in control. Hence, it should be washed properly before eating.
The amount of fertilizer used in sample is in excess amount then fertilizer used in control. Hence, it should be kept in open air for 2/3 days and washed properly before eating.
The amount of fertilizer used in sample is in extreme quantity. Hence, it is not healthy to eat.
